problem.message: Consider replacing `toolkit` functionality with native Miva features.
Consider replacing `toolbelt` functionality with native Miva features.
`l.settings` is implied within the `array` attribute. Use `$2` instead.
`g.` is not valid within the `array` attribute. Use `global:$2` instead.
NEVER assign `g.null` or `l.null` a value as it will overwrite the `NULL` keyword.
Outputting a variable without encoding can lead to XSS vulnerabilities.
